Description:
ShareCode[V7PEF] ver.11.0
[latest changes] Added detailed enemy variations as Enemy Mod.
Welcome to overcrowded PVE battles of 8player vs hordes of various AI bots!
Experience huge kill streaks, rampages, intense bullet hell and co-op battles against big bosses.
Choose unique various HERO MODs to found synergy with your hero and play with fun.
For fair play, smart(?) custom AI teammate will join if player is absent, so anytime play 8players.
